attributes.action: appear on the Pig Camera located in Estonia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Pig Camera (also known as Pigcam) is one of the sacred institutions of the country of Estonia, and is, as we all know, their only display of technology of any sort. By appearing on the Pigcam, Prime Minister Gordon Brown could show that he does, in fact, care about Eastern Europe.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
